item.title: Jacob Elordi, Oscar Isaac, Mia Goth Feature in New Images From Guillermo Del Toro’s ‘Frankenstein’
item.description: The movie, produced by del Toro and also starring Charles Dance and Christoph Waltz, is set to premiere at this year’s Venice Film Festival, followed by a global release on Netflix in November.
